author: cframpton
msg: Script to construct an Apache Flex SDK for an IDE on Windows using a downloaded Apache Flex bin distro (or source distro if you build it) and an Adobe Flex 4.6 SDK.   The script copies the pieces it needs from the Adobe Flex SDK to the Apache Flex SDK.  The easiest place to get the Adobe SDK is from FlashBuilder\sdks\4.6.0.
